name: Boomerang
description:
An arcade game where the player must last as long as they can in the arena equipped with only a boomerang.

Remake coming Soon!

Controls:

  • [WASD] or Arrows Keys to move.
  • [LMB] to throw the boomerang towards the cursor.
  • If the boomerang falls you need to walk over it to pick it up.

~~~

A game I created for school back in July 2016.

You probably shouldn't play this if you are sensitive to flashing lights.

This was made using VFS licensed programs. Hence the VFS splash screen.
